name: Business Sonata
description:
You're the CEO of a company and there's some firing that needs to be done. Can you make the right choice?

Made for Spooky Jam 2. The theme is "You are the monster".

Tip: You can replace the question mark face with your own by replacing BossFace.png in Business_Data \ StreamingAssets with your own image or photo. Just make sure it has the same name.
